descriptionHtml:
Allow player to carry up to 16 bodies at one time.  The logic follows similarly to zjy6400 reanimate spell and corpse collector.

How to use:
To carry a body first crouch and perform action (E) on a body.  A menu will pop-up to provide a selection either to "Carry" or to perform its default action.

SkyUI MCM Options:
Replace default action: When set to true, the action performed (E) during crouch on a body will immediate carry a body bypassing the default action.
Carry alive:  When set to true, the carry body operation will be enabled to living actor.

Requirements:
Sky UI with MCM for the options
author: azeritah
